import { Breadcrumbs, Button, Card, CardActions, CardContent, CardHeader, Grid, IconButton, Paper, Snackbar, TextField } from "@material-ui/core" import { useState } from "react" import axios from 'axios' import useBreadcrumbs, { routeConfig } from "../../../hooks/useBreadcrumbs" import { MdKeyboardArrowRight } from 'react-icons/md' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" const NewCourse = () => { const [mamonhoc, setMamonhoc] = useState('') const [tenmonhoc, setTenmonhoc] = useState('') const [tinchi, setTinchi] = useState(null) const [phanloai, setPhanloai] = useState('') const [mota, setMota] = useState('') const [bomon, setBomon] = useState('') const [post, setPost] = useState(false) const [alert, setAlert] = useState(false) const breadcrumbs = useBreadcrumbs(routeConfig) const handleSubmit = e => { setPost(true) console.log({ mamh: mamonhoc, tenmh: tenmonhoc, sotinchi: tinchi, phanloai, mota, mabomon: bomon }) axios.post('http://localhost:3001/api/monhoc', { mamh: mamonhoc, tenmh: tenmonhoc, sotinchi: tinchi, phanloai, mota, mabomon: bomon }).then(res => { setAlert(true) setPost(false) }).catch(err => { setAlert(true) setPost(false) }) } return <>
} className="page-breadcrumb"> {breadcrumbs.map(breadcrumb => ( {breadcrumb.name} ))}

Thêm môn học mới

setMamonhoc(e.target.value)} label="Mã môn học" /> setTenmonhoc(e.target.value)} label="Tên môn học" /> setTinchi(e.target.value)} type="number" label="Số tín chỉ" /> setPhanloai(e.target.value)} label="Phân loại" /> setBomon(e.target.value)} label="Bộ môn" /> setMota(e.target.value)} label="Mô tả" multiline />
setAlert(false)}> X } /> } export default NewCourse
